page.title: 09Law and Order
page.content: The local community policeman is well known, but is not a resident in the area. He is based in Eccleshall. If necessary police from Stafford are sent for to deal with any major crime. For example, Stafford police investigated and found a local arsonist who was responsible at various times for, vandalising the church, trying to set fire to Bishop's Wood and burning down two barns. In recent years there have been several burglaries in the area, and in each case thieves stole antiques. Apart from the odd poacher, there is very little crime in the area. There are no concentrations of young people to lead to vandalism or rough behaviour.
